content: the mosaic medley pumpkins are a free crochet pattern on my blog this easy crochet pumpkin pattern is worked from the bottom-up in the round and then cinched at the bottom stuffed cinched at the top to close and then the segments are created at the end one of my very favorite stitch patterns used for this crochet pumpkin pattern using basic easy crochet stitches - chains single and double_crochet stitches the unique mosaic appearance is made with the unique placement of the stitches there is no need to fasten_off when changing colors as the yarn floats from the color changes will be hidden inside your stuffed pumpkin - simply drop and pick up the yarn as indicated in the pattern which means no additional ends to weave in add poly fil fiber for stuffing and twigs cut to size for the stems
